reasoning: Mild BPD is a severity-classified subtype of BPD occurring in premature neonates. Estimated ~75 per 100k live births (0.075%) globally based on neonatal outcomes literature showing mild BPD comprises 40-50% of all BPD cases (total BPD incidence 150-200 per 100k births in high-income countries). Metric represents incidence in neonatal population rather than general population.
source: Horbar JD et al. (2017). Trends in Mortality and Morbidity for Very Low Birth Weight Infants, 1991-2006. Pediatrics.
